text:
Dear Team,

Hope all are doing good.

Recently we noticed there is an update in icon-set selection in a module settings of theme. Its having option to select font awesome icon selection. In this selection, we are getting below error.

Error:66:1Error in `/themes/construction-theme/modules/Header-modern.module/module.html` on line 104: InterpretException: Can't find icon 'arrow-circle-right' in set 'fontawesome-5.14.0'

Please suggest a solution for this issue.
